### Exam Details ğŸ§

- The exam consists of 2 random questions: either **`printf`** ğŸ–¨ï¸ or **`get_next_line`** ğŸ“.

- If you fail the exam, you can retake the same exercise. 

- Each **`grademe`** will increase the amount of time for the next attempt. â³

- **No Norminette** rules are applied.


## My Personal Approach

I start by writing down the exercise and reviewing the relevant subjects (printf or gnl). I then refresh my knowledge on the key concepts needed for each topic. 

For printf ğŸ–¨ï¸, I focus on variadic functions and conversion specifiers. 


For get_next_line ğŸ“, I concentrate on file handling, buffers, and the static variable. 

This structured review helps me prepare effectively for the exam.

For more details, refer to the following [documentation](https://github.com/DevAwizard/Exams_42/tree/main/.github/Exam_rank_3/My_personal_approach)ğŸ“„.
